_instructions.seller_name: Your full name as you want it to appear on Fiverr
_instructions.seller_title: Your professional title and main expertise areas
_instructions.company_name: Your business/company name (can be your name if freelancing)
_instructions.years_experience: Number of years of relevant experience (e.g., '10+', '5+')
_instructions.mba_credential: Your highest relevant degree or certification
_instructions.fortune_500_companies: Previous employers or major clients (if applicable)
_instructions.portfolio_value: Total value of projects managed (if applicable)
_instructions.delivery_acceleration: Percentage improvement in delivery speed (if applicable)
